00036 namespace {
00037   const int BUFFER_SIZE = 32768;
00038 }

00040 
00041 const char *CommandCopyToLocal::ms_usage[] = {
00042   "copyToLocal [--seek=<n>] <src> <dst>",
00043   "",
00044   "  This program copies the file <src> from the DFS to the file",
00045   "  <dst> in the local filesystem.  If --seek is supplied, then",
00046   "  the source file is seeked to offset <n> before starting the copy.",
00047   (const char *)0
00048 };

00050 
00051 void CommandCopyToLocal::run() {
00052   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00053   int32_t fd = 0;
00054   EventPtr event_ptr;
00055   FILE *fp = 0;
00056   uint64_t start_off = 0;
00057   int src_arg = 0;
00058   uint64_t offset;
00059   uint32_t amount;
00060   uint8_t *dst;
00061 
00062   if (m_args.size() < 2)
00063     HT_THROW(Error::PARSE_ERROR, "Insufficient number of arguments");
00064 
00065   if (!strcmp(m_args[0].first.c_str(), "--seek") && m_args[0].second != "") {
00066     start_off = strtol(m_args[0].second.c_str(), 0, 10);
00067     src_arg = 1;
00068   }
00069 
00070   try {
00071 
00072     if ((fp = fopen(m_args[src_arg+1].first.c_str(), "w+")) == 0)
00073       HT_THROW(Error::EXTERNAL, strerror(errno));
00074 
00075     fd = m_client->open(m_args[src_arg].first);
00076 
00077     if (start_off > 0) {
00078       m_client->seek(fd, start_off);
00079     }
00080 
00081     m_client->read(fd, BUFFER_SIZE, &sync_handler);
00082     m_client->read(fd, BUFFER_SIZE, &sync_handler);
00083     m_client->read(fd, BUFFER_SIZE, &sync_handler);
00084 
00085     while (sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00086 
00087       amount = Filesystem::decode_response_read_header(event_ptr, &offset, &dst);
00088 
00089       if (amount > 0) {
00090         if (fwrite(dst, amount, 1, fp) != 1)
00091           HT_THROW(Error::EXTERNAL, strerror(errno));
00092       }
00093 
00094       if (amount < (uint32_t)BUFFER_SIZE) {
00095         sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr);
00096         break;
00097       }
00098 
00099       m_client->read(fd, BUFFER_SIZE, &sync_handler);
00100     }
00101 
00102     m_client->close(fd);
00103 
00104     fclose(fp);
00105 
00106   }
00107   catch (Exception &e) {
00108     if (fp)
00109       fclose(fp);
00110     HT_THROW(e.code(), e.what());
00111   }
00112 }
